summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'biomedical named entity recognition cross-sharing' | Multitask learning for biomedical named entity recognition with cross-sharing structure | This repository is a Biomedical Named Entity Recognition model.
